summary: This release is mostly about fixing installation issues â€” Grove can now be installed directly from GitHub, and the library no longer crashes due to an import bug. I also moved the UI components to a separate repo and updated the docs.

fixes: Add exports to root package.json for GitHub direct installs
Remove import.meta.glob from library code to fix runtime errors
docs: Refresh TODO list and README with completed tasks
Update docs to reflect UI split to GroveUI repo
chores: Include dist folder in git for direct GitHub installs
